name: Elevator Pitch
description:
Transmit your idea to revolutionize the market. You have 15 seconds with Hideo Kojima an important director. Make them worthwhile!

Game made for the 2018 GGJ (https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/elevator-pitch)

---

  • Coded by Milton Candelero (me)
  • Art by Luciana Cacik (https://twitter.com/nolucacik)
  • Backend (That I didn't implement) by Juan Manuel Cruz (https://github.com/malows)
